explains: n. （尤指对个人或小组的）教学，指导；（尤指学院、大学或私立学校的）学费

sentences.en: I'll have to cough up $10,000 a year for tuition.
sentences.cn: 我将必须勉强支付每年$10000的学费。

sentences.en: Your parents will have to cover your tuition fees.
sentences.cn: 你的父母得支付你的学费。

sentences.en: Do parents have to bear the whole cost of tuition fees?
sentences.cn: 父母是否应当负担全部学费？
